posts.post_content:
I'd prefer cards with good picture contrast. I don't mind skinned or redone backs. I'm ok with a pinhole or small piece missing from the edge, so long as the picture is clean and clear. Will buy or trade.

thanks,
Andy

Hi Andy - Nice to see you again at the Chantilly Show.  I would be willing to trade one of the two Boyce cards I showed you.  As promised, here's a list of the N172 Washington players I am looking for:
1 player cards - Carney, Daly, Morrill, & Wise.
2 player cards - Gaffney/Shoch, Gardner/Murray, & O'Brien/Irwin.
I believe some of these are scarcer than others.
Val

Val:

Is this one of the Boyce cards you have? If so and you and Andy don't put a deal together I would be interested.

[IMG]http://i52.photobucket.com/albums/g5/jacklitsch1/19th%20Century/ojnonameboyce.jpg[/IMG]

Steve - Sorry, but I do not have a N172 with this pose of Boyce.
Val
